Uses of Class
org.apache.drill.exec.testing.ExecutionControls

  • Packages that use ExecutionControls 
    Package Description
    org.apache.drill.exec.ops  
    org.apache.drill.exec.rpc.data  
    org.apache.drill.exec.testing  
    org.apache.drill.test
    Provides a variety of test framework tools to simplify Drill unit tests and ad-hoc tests created while developing features.

    • Uses of ExecutionControls in org.apache.drill.exec.ops

      Return the set of execution controls used to inject faults into running code for testing.

      void DataTunnel.setTestInjectionControls(ControlsInjector testInjector, ExecutionControls testControls, org.slf4j.Logger testLogger)
      Once a DataTunnel is created, clients of DataTunnel can pass injection controls to enable setting injections at pre-defined places.
